message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I believe you would find valuable. I'm offering it to you for $11,500.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your interest, Bob. While I'm willing to negotiate, $10,500 is a bit too low for me. Could you do $11,200?
I'm still a bit above my budget, so I was thinking more along the lines of $10,800. Can you meet me in the middle?
